name: Motor Madness (itch)
description:
Motor Madness is an arcade game, designed for four players on one device. Inspired by Drive Ahead, this game includes many unique features, such as up to eight player support, a vigorous 50 level campaign, vehicles with various abilities, and over 20 different specialized heads that have the potential to change the games outcome. 

Game Features:

- 4 Map themes!
- Over 20 heads and Vehicles!
- 4 different Power-ups!
- Unique vehicle movement (driving, hovering, flying and floating)
- A 50 level campaign!
- In-game shop and currencies (coins, tokens and rubies)
- Complex game mechanics and Artificial Intelligence!
- Custom composed music!
- 20 different maps!
- 4 diverse gamemodes (15 combinations)
- Advanced game customization!




"A great laugh with your friends. Play anytime, anywhere. You can play it even if you have no friends."
- Lucas Mattler

Future Features:

- Earth RPG Story

- Improved Campaign

- Other Game Improvements
